document.heading: Fire and Emergency Medical Services Employee Presumptive Disability Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-311, the “Fire and Emergency Medical Services Employee Presumptive Disability Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-616. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 2012, and December 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 13, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-679 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-311 became effective on May 1, 2013.
